alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 5:13PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Scott, northeastern Polk and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mena Intermountain Airport, or near Mena, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opal... Mena Intermountain Airport... Acorn... Board Camp... Pine Ridge... Nunley... Cherry Hill in Polk County... Ink... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western Arkansas.
